description:
Not every case goes to court. Some reach a favorable solution before these rigorous, complex procedures begin. At Giroux Trial Attorneys, we never count on an easy resolution. We have extensive trial experience, which we put to use for our clients.

The goal at our law firm is to prepare our cases to succeed at court from the very beginning. This is in contrast to legal practices that might expect cooperation from insurance companies or quick settlements. We put in the time and effort to help our clients get the compensation they deserve - and we persevere until the end.

Local Firm With National-Level Trial Experience

Our law firm has handled well over 100 trial cases in state and federal courts. Members of our team have worked for every side, giving us the versatility and insight to predict what the opposition might do and form effective strategies to counteract it. We offer strong trial advocacy to all of Metro Detroit from our Southfield, Michigan, offices.

Tenacious Counsel For A Wide Range Of Injury Cases

Our attorneys have experience negotiating and litigating nearly every type of injury case. We represent clients injured in car accidents, including truck and commercial vehicle crashes, motorcycle accidents and pedestrian accidents. We also handle a wide range of medical malpractice suits, such as wrong-site surgeries, birth injuries, misdiagnosis and hospital negligence.

Here are some other types of cases we have won:

• Auto accident
• Medical malpractice
• Motorcycle accident
• Birth injury
• Construction site accident
• Trucking accident
• Civil rights
• Dog bites

Strong Advocates For Injured People

Our goal is to help injured people put their lives back together. At Giroux Trial Attorneys, we go the extra mile to help get our clients what they truly deserve. Free consultations are available.
